Method Detail

compareTo

public int compareTo(Person person)
Compares the age of this object with another object with the age of a person object provided as a parameter.

Parameters:
Person - person whose age is going to be compared with the one in this object.
Returns:
int 0 if both ages are the same. -1 if the age of this object is lower than the age of the person provided as a parameter. +1 otherwise.
